Author: semsyor
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: A NU Design  With the upcoming release of our “NU” design we thought we would show you one of our drafts for our “NU” Coin Image.    We have been experimenting with a lot of ideas recently and the primary reason that this design stands out to us is that it truly captures the essence of our robust Multiplayer Infrastructure.  For a moment lets consider that each line is a communication channel and each intersecting point of the of the lines is a Service Provider/Masternode. In the event that any one of them unexpectedly goes offline the connectivity can then be routed through other channels and intersections (Service Providers/Masternodes) So with the presale now underway come join the future of multiplayer gaming.  https://medium.com/@networkunits/a-nu-design-729595b3f7f

Author: sv.alyona
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Website Design Concept 2 https://medium.com/@networkunits/website-design-concept-2-f1b7c6ead4a4  As we near the release of our updated website design, we thought we would share another concept that we are experimenting with.  Because we are essentially a Gaming Token, we really wanted to incorporate a retrowave feel to our project. It is really important for us that our design reflects the topic of our ICO.  The background element is an SVG, the reason we have chosen to utilize an SVG is so we can animate the elements independently of each other. Although you cannot see it in the picture, the planet like object with the superimposed NU logo is actually spinning and bobbing and doing all sorts of cool stuff!  So…. will this concept make it to the finals? Stay tuned to find out.

Author: prometheum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Seasons greetings NU supporters. Although we did not reach the minimum goal for the presale we are excited to announce that the project will continue.  The team that successfully managed the Gladius campaign will now manage NU. Under this new management you can expect a much-needed rebranding, restructuring and all-round improvements to the technical aspects of the project and the crowd sale.  For current participants of the presale you will get tokens for the new smart contract that is to be released.  With the stronger backing that we now have we aim to look forward to a brighter future for the project. Thank you to all the supporters that have stood by us, please stay tuned for more details.

Author: crevbi
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: How to Transfer from the Previous Bounty Campaign to the new system  For new members that did not participate in the previous Bounty Campaign please read this guide for instructions on joining.  Request a Transfer Code URL by sending a PM to @dan_shirazi (admin) who can be found on the NU Telegram Chat  Login to the NU Platform, if you haven't already please Register    Paste the Transfer URL provided into the browser and press enter    Some details will be filled in for you, please fill in the missing details and click Register    You will now see the Bounty Campaign Dashboard, click Bounties to start adding your Bounty Entries    https://medium.com/@networkunits/how-to-transfer-to-the-new-bounty-system-6126eae9f3b5

Author: crevbi
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Developers Bonanza! https://medium.com/@networkunits/developers-bonanza-7d3abc31bc9c  The cost and hurdles involved in being a development house can stifle creation of new and original content. With NU, we are removing a few of those hurdles, and in collaboration with developers, we want to see new genre defining content that is utilizing our technology. With resources and focus aimed solely on game development, leaving our team to take care of the network, infrastructure and monetary aspects of development, game developers can now focus wholly on content. Costs will also be kept down, whilst rewards will be kept at a premium.

Author: crevbi
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Plug in and get Paid  With certainty, all things games based are generating a buzz throughout the entertainment industry. As E-Sports gets closer to becoming an Olympic games offering, the maturing gaming industry requires a more mature infrastructure.  Our rewards based token NU, aims to bridge to gap from old to nu(pun intended) by rewarding those who participate, whether you are playing a game (active client) on the network, and by proxy, policing the Service providers which if penalized we intend to share any penalty charges, or if you are a Service Provider or a Developer, our aim is to reward participation and remove any complexity so that it just feels right.  A successful partnership is developed through a transparency, communication and a product that everyone involved feels enthused about. So with the presale now underway come join the future of multiplayer gaming.  https://medium.com/@networkunits/plug-in-and-get-paid-daa2df39383d

Author: prometheum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Hi all  We have released multiple guides in regards to our Alpha that has recently been released, we hope this is helpful for those that want to try out our platform.  Platform Registration: https://medium.com/@networkunits/nu-platform-registration-935361649480  Service Provider Platform Setup: https://medium.com/@networkunits/nu-platform-setting-up-a-service-provider-74fd44f3f0d6  Active Client Platform Setup: https://medium.com/@networkunits/nu-platform-setting-up-an-active-client-d9bbdeb9133d  Alpha Client Windows/Mac Install https://medium.com/@networkunits/nu-client-alpha-windows-mac-ae99a66120c7   Our Alpha Service Application guide will be ready shortly so keep an eye out for it. In the meantime the following notes will be helpful: Public IP address is required, unless you can set up your router to provide the same functionality, Port 7777 must be open for both UDP and TCP It can be run on headless or non headless on a windows or windows server OS It can be run on headless only for Linux. We recommend Ubuntu for the Linux installation. You can find the downloadable alpha on our website: https://networkunits.io

Author: Bullexadam
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: I studied about this ICO and I still have some questions.  Why should I put my Ether in this ICO and not in an other, what makes this ICO work?  If this project is working how many gamers can work with this blockchain, and do you have an indication how huge this will be in the near future?  Is it easy to mine or rent out your computer space / internet bandwidth even if you are a normal gamer without to many experience with crypto/blockchain?  Why is the pre-ICO quite long?  Who picked the team and why did NU choose that team  If I have these first questions answered I am quite sure I will invest in this project, I mean the bonus you get right now is very interesting.

Author: prometheum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Hi Bullexadam  Thank you for your queries.   Why should I put my Ether in this ICO and not in an other, what makes this ICO work? While I agree that there are many great projects out there to choose from, Network Units has some unique key points of interest: Network Units has two unique mining processes, firstly gamers can connect their wallets and participate in our verification process while they play games and earn tokens for doing so. Secondly, Computer and Server owners can rent out their unused bandwidth and processing power to developers and also earn tokens for doing so. Network Units will develop an easy to integrate Unity3D asset for developers to integrate into their own games. This asset will simplify network code development as well as simplifying their infrastructure needs So to conclude Network Units is a cryptocurrency that does not just target one group of people. But Gamers, Game Developers and Resource Owners. Additionally, our asset will be multiplatform and will be easy to integrate into Mobile, PC, Holographic, AR, VR devices and more.   If this project is working how many gamers can work with this blockchain, and do you have an indication how huge this will be in the near future? We all know the gaming industry is massive however our platform is built for multiplayer gaming. Even though multiplayer gaming is a portion of this industry it has been proven that gamers spend more money and time on multiplayer games than single player and in many cases, are actually willing to pay for micro transactions or subscription fees to play. With the power of the Blockchain we have a mechanism to provide the opposite. Rather than charge gamers we can reward those that want to participate in our verification process. This feature is going to drive more gamers to games developed with the NU framework. Developers that realize this will naturally want to utilize our platform with the added advantage of cheaper infrastructure costs due to NU making use of unused Processing Power and bandwidth. This automatically makes the NU platform more appealing than traditional and centralized alternatives. To answer your question more clearly, the more developers that integrate the NU framework into their games then the larger our platform will grow!   Is it easy to mine or rent out your computer space / internet bandwidth even if you are a normal gamer without to many experience with crypto/blockchain? Eventually this will be very easy to do. For experienced users they will be able to link their own wallets, for those that are less experienced we will handle the wallets for them. This allows anyone regardless of Blockchain experience to start earning tokens straight away.   Why is the pre-ICO quite long? There are multiple reasons for this decision. The volatility of the Cryptocurrency Market To allow us as much time as possible to grow the NU community To gain more interest in our project To improve the quality of our project.   Who picked the team and why did NU choose that team Initially the NU team is made up of the Evil Badger Game Studio based in Australia and New Zealand. As game developers we realized that the next stage of evolution for us would be multiplayer gaming. Rather than build an internal framework we wanted the ability to share it with other developers and their players. The Blockchain allows us to do it in a very unique manner that was previously unimaginable. Although as a company we have never done a Token Crowdsale before, we have a panel of extremely talented and knowledgeable Advisors with successful Crowdsale experience that have been indispensable in providing the guidance and resources that we need.  Please feel free to let us know if you have further thoughts or questions.

Essentially it depends on the situation in any case we will identify the problem, the issue, analyze, plan, then implement solution and advise how it would affect you personally.  Feel free to let us know of any specifics or further thoughts or questions you may have.  We welcome input from potential partners.

Body: No problem Bullexdam, we welcome any feedback or questions the community may have about the project. However the use cases differ:  Gladius aims to fight DDOS attacks. Network Units aims to provide a Decentralized Multiplayer Framework that is easily integrated into Games.

Author: prometheum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Network Units - The Future of Multiplayer  Seasons greetings NU supporters. Although we did not reach the minimum goal for the presale we are excited to announce that the project will continue.  The team that successfully managed the Gladius campaign will now manage NU. Under this new management you can expect a much-needed rebranding, restructuring and all-round improvements to the technical aspects of the project and the crowd sale.  For current participants of the presale you will get tokens for the new smart contract that is to be released.  With the stronger backing that we now have we aim to look forward to a brighter future for the project. Thank you to all the supporters that have stood by us, please stay tuned for more details. Author: kamiyama
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: The Network Unit Token 1. Users with more than 10,000 NU tokens will be able to earn more tokens by becoming hosts or relays by renting out their hardware 2. Developers who wish to have an easy to integrate, secure and stable multiplayer network solution can rent the Network Units infrastructure using NU tokens. 3. Developers will receive a share of the penalties if one of their hosts are penalized. This will be awarded in NU tokens 4. NU tokens will be tradable on exchanges 5. Active Clients are the players that participate in the verification process. They help to make the network stronger and more secure. For their participation, they receive a part of the tokens awarded to the masternode operator, based on their contribution.

Author: prometheum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Hi Amrul, we will support Android, iOS, PC Games and more  There are two mining processes: 1) Gamers that connect their wallets to help make the network stronger by way of verification. 2) Service providers who share their computing power and resources for game developers to host their multiplayer games on. More service providers will expand our network infrastructure.  I hope this answers your question, feel free to let us know if you have more questions or queries regarding our post.

Author: prometheum
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: In order to ensure that the Network Units crowdsale runs as safely as possible we have decided to have our smart contract audited by the Hosho Group who are the Global Leaders in Solidity. We have therefore had to delay the Pre ICO. It will now commence on the 8th of November 2017. We truly appreciate your support and are very excited to have you take part in the NU decentralized revolution. Feel free to let us know if you have any questions regarding this announcement.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] Network Units - Multiplayer Decentralized - Public Presale
Body: Network Units Designs a New Framework for Multiplayer Gaming Systems  Network Units (NU) is providing a decentralized framework for game developers to plug in their already created games in order to reach their target audience. This framework will be powered by renting the unused bandwidth and computational power of platform users you are will to make them available for monetary rewards.  Innovations are influencing market growth  The online gaming marketplace is growing exponentially, and this is mainly due to the emerging innovations that is powered by recent technological developments. One of the concepts that is attracting users and making them spend more time on game sites is the multiplayer gaming concept.  Multiplayer games are games that involve the interaction of more than one individual playing in the same environment. Such games allow players interaction with other individuals in partnership, competition or rivalry, providing them with social communication absent from single-player games. These multiplayer games are responsible for gamers spending more time playing games, and consequently generating more revenue for the gaming platforms. This explains the recent expansion in the global gaming market size that has seen it grow to up to $100 Billion.  https://coinidol.com/network-units-framework-for-multiplayer-gaming/
